thread.title: Arsenal and Tottenham keeping tabs on Eibar's former Manchester City defender Florian Lejuene
thread.title_full: Arsenal and Tottenham keeping tabs on Eibar's former Manchester City defender Florian Lejuene

author: Darren Lewis
title: Arsenal and Tottenham keeping tabs on Eibar's former Manchester City defender Florian Lejuene
text:
Arsenal and Tottenham keeping tabs on Eibar's former Manchester City defender Florian Lejuene The Frenchman has impressed in La Liga with minnows Eibar, whom he cost just £1.3million last summer Share Lejuene has been watched by both north London clubs (Photo: AFP/Getty Images) Share Get Arsenal FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Arsenal and Spurs are among a number of clubs tracking Eibar defender Florian Lejeune. 
The 25-year-old Frenchman, who can also play in midfield, has attracted interest from a number of clubs after impressing in La Liga this season. 
Lejeune has a release clause of just £8.7million which could make him a bargain capture this summer. 
He was bought by Manchester City two years ago after doing well with Spanish club Girona. But he was immediately loaned out before being sold to Eibar for just £1.3m last summer. Lejeune clears ahead of Yannick Ferreira Carrasco (Photo: Getty) Read More William Carvalho looks set to land Premier League move thanks to deep-rooted links 
Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger is understood to have had Lejeune scouted on a number of occasions with favourable reports each time. 
Spurs boss Mauricio Pochettino is seeking more depth at centre-half with Austrian 24-year-old Kevin Wimmer keen to play more regularly and set to move on this summer. poll loading Arsenal or Spurs: If you could choose, who would you join? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
